Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ((ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"]) > 0) ? "have kids" : "no kids") FROM root
SELECT VALUE root["Children"][0]["Pets"][0]["GivenName"] FROM root WHERE ((ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"]) > 0) AND (ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"][0]["Pets"]) > 0))

Input.Description: unary, indexer, property, function call -> function call

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ABS((- ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"][0]["Pets"]))) FROM root WHERE (ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"]) > 0)
SELECT VALUE ((((root["Int"] % 10) * ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"])) > 0) ? [((root["Int"] % 10) * ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"]))] : []) FROM root

Input.Expression: query.Select(f => new AnonymousType(parentCount = f.Parents.Count(), childrenCount = f.Children.Count())).Select(r => IIF((r.parentCount > 0), Floor((Convert(r.childrenCount, Double) / Convert(r.parentCount, Double))), 0))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE (({"parentCount": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Parents"]), "childrenCount": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"])}["parentCount"] > 0) ? FLOOR(({"parentCount": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Parents"]), "childrenCount": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"])}["childrenCount"] / {"parentCount": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Parents"]), "childrenCount": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"])}["parentCount"])) : 0) FROM root
SELECT VALUE CONCAT(root["Parents"][0]["FamilyName"], root["Parents"][0]["GivenName"]) FROM root

Input.Expression: query.Select(f => IIF((f.Parents.Count() > 0), f.Parents, new Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Services.Management.Tests.Parent[](0))).Select(p => new AnonymousType(parentCount = p.Count()))
query.Select(f => new AnonymousType(children = f.Children)).Select(c => IIF((c.children.Count() > 0), c.children[0].GivenName, "no kids"))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ((ARRAY_LENGTH({"children": root["Children"]}["children"]) > 0) ? {"children": root["Children"]}["children"][0]["GivenName"] : "no kids") FROM root

Input.Expression: query.Select(f => new AnonymousType(family = f, children = f.Children.Count())).Select(f => IIF(((f.children > 0) AndAlso (f.family.Children[0].Pets.Count() > 0)), f.family.Children[0].Pets.get_Item(0).GivenName, "no kids"))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ((({"family": root, "children": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"])}["children"] > 0) AND (ARRAY_LENGTH({"family": root, "children": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"])}["family"]["Children"][0]["Pets"]) > 0)) ? {"family": root, "children": ARRAY_LENGTH(root["Children"])}["family"]["Children"][0]["Pets"][0]["GivenName"] : "no kids") FROM root
